about_the_game:
The 【 Happy Corp. 】 invites you to follow up on the story of one of the most ferocious abnormality: The Red Man.

In this game, you control a human who heads to the world's darkest place.

On this adventure you'll go through many rooms which you are free to explore at your own pace. There are two phases: the “going”, in which you can unlock red collectibles in each of the rooms; and the “return” which makes each room slightly change and so it's collectible.

These collectables change the behaviour of the game. It may be a good idea to try to collect them all !

As you explore, the progress on every collectible will be shown on the screen. BUT BEWARE !! Getting a game over will close the game and restart your progress!

Will you be able to overcome the darkness?
